Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored Lithuania to win based on their recent defensive stability and Cyprus' struggles in front of goal.
Others: Lithuania have kept clean sheets in three of their last four matches, showcasing strong defensive form.
Cyprus have failed to win a competitive away match since 2019, losing 14 out of their last 17 such encounters.
Both teams have struggled to score, with Cyprus averaging just 0.4 goals per game in their Euro 2024 qualification campaign.
